img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where a character, labeled as "Second Rat Prince," is engaged in combat with an enemy known as "King of Flowing Sands." The setting is a barren, rocky landscape with sparse vegetation. The player character is wielding a staff and is facing the enemy, who is swinging a large weapon, creating a cloud of dust. Various icons and health bars are visible on the screen, indicating gameplay elements such as abilities and health status.
